DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose experiment help Humana investigate launch program send message design improve customer ' engagement . The investigator ' past research show certain life event calendar event ( e.g. , job change , birthday , holiday , Monday ) feel like `` fresh start '' people potential motivate begin pursue health goal ( e.g. , exercise , start diet , quit smoking ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose experiment help Humana investigate launch program send message design improve customer ' engagement . The investigator ' past research show certain life event calendar event ( e.g. , job change , birthday , holiday , Monday ) feel like `` fresh start '' people potential motivate begin pursue health goal ( e.g. , exercise , start diet , quit smoking ) . In experiment , investigator test ( ) whether Humana increase effectiveness message send customer around fresh start moment ( b ) whether highlight recent fresh start event Humana 's message increase customer engagement .
